name: Bingo Master King
description:
A simple game in which matches numbers, marking the selected numbers.

[Game Feature]
- Easy and casual Bingo game for everyone.
- Game mode supported to 8 Bingo cards (Max).
- Supported Auto-marking system for user convenience.
- 5 different power items to help user’s Bingo.
- Various rewards from Gatcha
- Bonus rewards by users play time
- Daily free coupon rewards system
- 1:1 Multi-play supported
- 16 language supported
- Leader board, Achievement, Friend invitation system supported.
